title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.16 - Promotional contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 209.16 - Promotional contracts

State Regulations

No licensed promoter shall have the right to assign any
contract with a licensed professional boxer or licensed mixed martial artist
for activities to take place within the State of New York without first
obtaining the boxer's or mixed martial artist's written consent. Such consent
shall not be required if the promoter assigns less than all the rights under
any such contract with respect to a particular bout. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
